events.message: I filed a claim today after my car was involved in a collision with another vehicle at an intersection.
The claim has been categorized under Auto Accident after review of the initial report and photos submitted.
An agent was assigned to handle my auto accident claim and will be my contact moving forward.
Received official acknowledgment of my claim submission with an estimated timeline for processing.
The insurance company requested additional documents including police report and repair estimates.
I submitted all requested documents, including the detailed police report and the mechanicâ€™s damage assessment.
Investigation into the collision circumstances and liability factors began with collection of witness statements.
Investigation concluded with confirmation of fault and verification of vehicle damage and injury claims.
A settlement amount was proposed based on estimated repair costs and compensation for injury-related expenses.
I provided feedback appreciating timely updates and clarity throughout the claim process.
The claim was approved officially, confirming the coverage of all submitted expenses related to the accident.
Received payment covering repair costs and part of the medical expenses directly related to the auto accident.
The claim was successfully closed and all processes completed to my satisfaction after the payment was issued.
